participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Driven and passionate about sports and family.
participant_1.background: i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor. i am a professional tennis player. my family is continuously growing. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Resilient and adaptable, with a love for teamwork.
participant_2.background: my father is in the army. i love playing softball. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business.

content.text: I am PhD scholar and work in a research laboratory
